description: This file contains Playwright test scripts for the Board Layout feature of an application, including test case definitions and assertions on the Kanban board UI elements.

methods.name: test.describe
methods.description: Defines a suite of related tests for Board Layout.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Defines an individual test case, such as verifying the default board load.

methods.name: expect
methods.description: Assertions for verifying conditions in tests, such as element visibility or count.
